title: The Sea Otter Classic official Festival Guide has arrived
content:
Sea Otter Classic runs from April 20th to the 23rd in Monterey, California. And with it being right around the corner, the official Festival Guide is now available online for reading and download. 

This latest edition of the Life Time Sea Otter Classic official Festival Guide is prepared and published by sister publication Bicycle Retailer & Industry News. You’ll find 48 pages of information to help you get the most out of Sea Otter. That includes maps, exhibitor lists, camping guides, and tips about things to look forward to during the biggest cycling event in the United States. 

You’ll also find some words from us here at CyclingTips and our friends at Pinkbike and VeloNews.

Grab a physical copy at Sea Otter Classic, or download the Festival Guide to get started today.

Download the Festival Guide
author: Alvin Holbrook
